content: the **hidden key** is a **bonus free pattern** to stretch your fingers and oil your crochet wand before the official start of amigurumi school of magic 6 > download this tiny free pattern to have taste a little of our **school of magic mystery cal** *early-bird sign-ups are opened until october 1st 2024 * the pattern is written in us crochet terms with step-by-step images to guide you along the way the project can be made with your preferred yarn the sample was made in dk-weight cotton with 2 5 or 3 0mm hook
